ValidationRule.description: This will require that Deposit details are entered before moving to Term Sheet Signed/Deposit Collected (except for SAB 1-4 units)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT ( $Profile.Name= "System Administrator"), ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Term Sheet Signed/Deposit Collected'), NOT( AND( Record_Type_Name__c = "Single_Asset_Bridge_Loan", TEXT(LOC_Loan_Type__c) = "Single Asset (1-4 Unit)" )), OR( ISNULL( Deposit_Amount__c ), ISNULL( Deposit_Fed_Reference__c ), ISNULL( Deposit_Collected__c ), ISNULL( Term_Sheet_Issued__c ), ISNULL( Term_Sheet_Signed__c )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Deposit Amount Collected, Deposit Collected Date, Deposit Fed Reference # and Term Sheet Signed date is required for this Stage
